thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Trinidad Drilling Ltd. Initiates Strategic Review Process

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Trinidad Drilling Ltd. Initiates Strategic Review Process
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Trinidad Drilling Ltd:
* TRINIDAD DRILLING LTD. INITIATES STRATEGIC REVIEW PROCESS
* TRINIDAD DRILLING LTD - COMMENCED A FORMAL PROCESS TO INITIATE A STRATEGIC REVIEW IN AN EFFORT TO ENHANCE SHAREHOLDER VALUE
* TRINIDAD DRILLING LTD - BOARD HAS APPOINTED A SPECIAL COMMITTEE OF INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS TO FACILITATE AND LEAD REVIEW
* TRINIDAD DRILLING - DOES NOT INTEND TO DISCLOSE DEVELOPMENTS REGARDING STRATEGIC REVIEW PROCESS UNLESS BOARD HAS APPROVED A SPECIFIC TRANSACTION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
